reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable with pockets and appreciate its versatility, being able to dress it up or keep it casual. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice casual dress, very comfortable.
items.body: This dress for me was roomy without being frumpy or shapeless. I have big boobs with a size DD on a good day and the 2x fit nicely and was pretty cute and comfortable to wear. I wore it at a baby shower and it was perfect. The little design on the bottom trim really brought the look together. The fabric is light but just above too light. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress at great price!
items.body: I ordered this dress in the blue Mandala Boho print, size Medium. I am 5'8, 140 lbs for reference. I took it to Mexico last week, and it was the perfect choice. The print is so pretty, and the length hit about an inch above my knee. I like modest lengths, so it was just right. The material was soft, and it did not cling. It was also not see-through. It was casual enough to wear around the resort during the day, but it was also nice enough to wear to dinner. I got several compliments on it. I have machine-washed it on delicate and tumble dried on low, and the dress did not shrink or fade. This dress is a fantastic deal for only $17--super cute!! Read more
items.author: Becky

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised when I received the dress and tried it on. I was afraid it would be too long for me as I am 5'1". The dress fit perfectly and was the correct length. I wore it recently and it was very comfortable and cute. Read more
items.author: Becky

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought more!
items.body: Cute pattern, comfortable, great for running errands or lunch out. Says machine wash and dry but I drip dried just in case and had no wrinkles. Fits well through bust and a little roomy through hips. Pockets in great front-of-dress location so no hip bulges. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice product
items.body: True to size. Nice fit. Soft comfortable fabric. Read more
items.author: L.C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Casual dress for running around town
items.body: Cute little dress for running around town. It could be dressed up if you want. It does run a bit smaller than the size stated. It is thick enough that when the sun shines it does not show through. It is quite comfortable and does not cling to the body. There is a little bit of give to the fabric, but not much. I am quite pleased with this purchase. Read more
items.author: Bobbi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Ultimate Versatile Dress for Every Occasion
items.body: I recently purchased the WIHOLL 2025 Casual Summer V Neck Wedding Guest Dress and it has quickly become a staple in my wardrobe. I was looking for a single dress that could handle multiple occasions, and this one absolutely delivers. The design is simple yet elegant, making it perfect for a range of events. The V-neck and short sleeves are both stylish and comfortable, especially for warm weather. The fabric is lightweight and breathable, which is exactly what you need for a summer day or a vacation. What really makes this dress stand out is its incredible versatility. I've worn it for a casual day out, dressed it up with some jewelry for a wedding, and even packed it for a beach vacation. It's a true all-in-one piece that saves me from having to buy a different outfit for every single occasion. Overall, I am extremely happy with this dress. It's fashionable, comfortable, washable and incredibly adaptable. If you're looking for a reliable, go-to dress that can transition seamlessly from day to night and from a casual outing to a special event, this is the one for you. Read more
items.author: CeoBred

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size down unless you like your stuff bigger
items.body: Cute, but too big. Iâ€™d need at least an xsmall and a small is the lowest it goes(reason for the 4 stars) Material was soft which was good, the print was ok/mediocre, they definitely need some pattern updates, but if you like any of these I definitely recommend. They are not see through, have pockets and comfortable. Material was not thick, not was it sheer, it was a nice in between and had a nice flow to it ðŸ’œ Read more
items.author: Noneyabusiness

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 2-leaf Print, 2-red-white Floral, 1-ethnic Print, 5-mandala Boho Print, 5-boho Stripes, 1-blue Floral, 3-boho Print, 4-coconut Flower, 0-black, 2-yellow Floral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
